messages.message:
Hi, Both split classification (after splitting) and classification tasks call the same Chain for classification.
When I try to do this on a different AIHub build project - it works fine with file splitting enabled - https://aihub.instabase.com/build/019763bd-9469-7744-aaea-3d8c3dbcf861
This is most likely due to the variability of LLMs.
I will debug this and make sure the same context and the same model is called for both the tasks and let you know.
cc - @Atinder
